name: Lorenzo Taylor
text: Very friendly staff and delicious food! I had the PCM for One. The pizza was thin, light, crispy, and flavorful. The chicken was juicy with a nice crispy skin, freshly cooked. The mojos (potato wedges) were absolutely amazing. Reasonably prices. Definitely recommend giving them a try.

name: donny blaze
text: First time here and I was impressed with the layout.  They can hold huge parties in the middle and lots of booths around the sides. They have a selection of bottled beer as well as tap specials. Pepsi products for the kiddos, most ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Price
text: The staff was very attentive and friendly. This was our first time eating here and we were visiting from Vegas. My parents remembered eating here in the Philippines and that is what prompted us to stop in. We are glad we did. This will be a stop every time we go to San Diego.

name: Kel
text: Mojos are AWESOME, Pizza is good, but despite ordering extra cheese, numerous times, only received extra cheese, one time. this was because the manager was there when I had mentioned it to one of the workers. Despite the nearly cheeseless pizza, it still is pretty good. I mostly go for the mojos anyway

name: Lawrence Martinez
text: Great food and service from Hector and his crew. Nice and clean place. I recommend eating there. I'll be back. ..

name: The Guerrero-Chairez Family
text: Not gonna lie and say it was my favorite joint, but it was good. Their service was great. Their prices are a little high, but not too bad. We ordered a 9 inch pizza, pepperoni mushroom, some mojo potatoes, and some chicken bites . Pizza had ‚Ä¶More

name: Jacqueline Ruiz
text: My family and I are huge fans of Shakeys and this was our first time here in Escondido‚Äôs Shakeys and I can honestly say this is probably the best one we have been at. Not only was the food delicious and fresh but the customer service was ‚Ä¶More

name: mandy randall
text: pizza and service at this location is super good. Good place to catch up with friends. Service is typically great.

name: James Benet
text: Very crowded but the food is always nice with thin crust pizza and tasty fried chicken. Great place for kids and teens to gather with friends and play arcade games which today is a rare site. Feels like back in the mid 80s which many parents will appreciate.

name: rey Rey
text: Started great service and everyone was great till the pizza arrived. The pan pizza came out under cooked and you can literally play with the dough.  I Allowed them to make it right and a big fella said that's how it is because the sauce ‚Ä¶More

name: kent eaton
text: Amazing thin crust, plus mojo's and chicken. Fantastic customer service!

name: Dirk Reschly
text: Tried out the buffet today. The salad choices were excellent and there was a rotating selection of pizzas. The fried  chicken was crispy and properly kept warm by heat lamps. After you sit down the fried chicken is still hot! Be careful. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ed Hazen
text: Pizza like eating a stale cracker. Great and friendly service though.

name: Cristina Rosales
text: Nice friendly family restaurant.Staff was amazing and very welcoming. My family and I went for the Lunch buffet for 9.99 it was a great deal it includes all types of üçï pizza,chicken,mojo potatoes,mash potatoes,corn,pasta,salad and other delicious items. We all left Full and satisfied üòå. Will be returning again!

name: Amy Quintana
text: We used to go to Chula Vista Shakeys. They closed, so, we made the trip to Escondido to the brand new Shakeys. It's big, it's bright, lots of space and the assistant manager Edgar from Chula Vista is now in charge there, so be sure service ‚Ä¶More

name: David Drake
text: Very good thin crust pizza. Staff very friendly and courteous.  Great for large groups.  Many kids here well behaved. Several folks dining alone.  Right across from the Escondido Center for the Arts .  Great game room. Frankly lots of fun.

name: Aaron Simms
text:
Thought we'd try Shakey's for a change of pace.
We ordered think crust extra crispy and that's what we got. Think I'd prefer a bit more sauce and cheese but the proportions were good. The sauce was a bit on ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff J
text: I used to really like Shakey‚Äôs pizza, so I thought we would try the new Shakey‚Äôs in Escondido.  What a disappointment!  We ordered online and when we got there the pizza was no where to be found.  We were told our order ticket had ‚Ä¶More

name: Bev Ann G
text: Great place for kids and Adults alike. Game Room for the kids and Sports Fans can watch TV from anywhere in the place. Pizza is good, beer and wine are also available. Service this time on a Monday at 5:30 was poor. There were 3 other ‚Ä¶More

text: Food are great specially the chicken üòã

name: Samone Sandidge
text: I thought the pizza tasted great. The service was also pretty good.  We were asked if we needed anything and how things were tasting fairly often. They really wanted is to have a nice experience.  A little pricey for me though.  A small pizza was just under $20

name: Mila Duenas
text: We finally had a day when we could take the kids to check this place out and they couldn't have been more excited....man what a letdown. The food beyond awful. It literally looked like cafeteria food and tasted exactly like it. I walked ‚Ä¶More

name: ART MALDONADO
text: Great as usual. We traveled from Stockton, way up North to have some Shakey's Pizza

name: M Brogan
text: The staff seemed to care and really try, but the food was mediocre at best.

name: Rob
text: Great place, the food was awesome. They offer a great brunch deal. Lots of choices for pizza. They have amazing dessert pizza and great salad bar. Nice desserts as well. They only negative was the drinks weren't part of the brunch deal. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Tim Bronkhurst
text: Ive been going to Shakey's since the early 60's. And the pizza back then was better. But I still enjoy Shakey's and this new restaurant is pretty awesome. The buffet was bigger and better prepared then the Oceanside location. However, the lettuce greens really need some love and care. Cut the lettuce and wash them would be a start.

name: S P
text: Very good pizza. Crowded, hot & stuffy but went for our 1st time on a Saturday night(6-8pm). Atmosphere was loud & like a ratio reversal from Chuck E Cheese. Adults were the majority & getting Liiiitt!! Not very clean in seating area. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Steven Harvey
text: The staff were absolutely awesome. They took care of a party of 50 without any issues. I highly recommend this place.

name: Ryan Bottoms
text: Such a cool place for lunch! You can't beat that deal! All you can eat was the way to my heart and you guys got it on the first try! Seriously good pizza, darn good fried chicken, and ice cold beer. If my mouth wasn't full of pizza right ‚Ä¶More

name: ted stotz
text: They're BACK! Not exactly the same, no straw hats and sleeve garters... It's GREAT! Family pizza joint with BEER for Dad. The MOJO potatoes are just like you remember. Salad bar is AMAZING! Chicken is better than ever, and the PIZZA is why we came...

name: DANIELA M
text: This new locating is nice and clean. Very modern with plenty of room for big parties and booths. The pizza was great and so was their fries chicken. Reminded me of coming to Shakey's when I was young.

name: Adrian Paredes
text: For the 10 something you can eat as much pizza, baked and fried chicken,salad, bread twists. They also have an ok arcade room. Overall this is a great place to take large parties. We were a group of 8 and the staff paid as much attention to ‚Ä¶More

name: Thomas Wright
text: The staff was very tentative and friendly. The place was clean and the buffet was amazing! I caught the game and my boys won some great prizes at the arcade.

name: Eric Acosta
text: Shakey's looks as though they are making a comeback. I used to love coming here when I was young and now it looks as though my kids may enjoy it as well. The food was good and the atmosphere was great. Just be prepared to spend some cash at the arcade. I didn't remember that as a kid but I'm sure my parents did!

name: Paula Casas
text: Its a average place to go, to get your moneys worth go during lunch buffet hours 11-2pm its decent pricing $6.29 kids & $9.99 adults

name: Maximilian Shakal
text: I had never been to a Shakey's, but I think it's a one-and-done type of place. Average food for an average price - I got the $10 deal, but the pizza was very pedestrian. They do have draft beer for a reasonable price though, but you might ‚Ä¶More

text: Expected more for the price taste like the Wal-Mart frozen pizza

name: Teresa Geirk
text: Mojo's are good smoothies and garlic bread

name: Cod Murr
text: Great pizza we ordered 2 large pepperoni and a meat lover and beer. 15 minutes is all they needed to get the pizza out. It was so good. We all loved it. While the adults chilled our kids played games and earned prizes.

name: Sm Abbott
text: Nice place.  Pizza was good. Service was very good. Clean, except the restrooms.  A little on the pricey side compared to others,  but we have a good time.

name: Lorene Jordan
text: Nice selection. Would be nice to go with kids because of arcade area.

name: Kelly Yates
text: Shakeys is awesome! Always has been, always will be! Had an issue with my order being incorrect, manager went above and beyond his job. I left there with a smile on my face  and a renewed belief in those who do a joint b well done. Thank you, Mr manger. I truly appreciate you job well done

GREAT place

text: Great place to eat an early lunch  A good spot for the fam. Nice concept.

text: Got the Texas pizza with boneless chicken. Would definitely go back and the staff is super friendly and welcoming. I will be going g back soon.

name: V W
text: Nice to have a Shakeys Pizza Palor in Escondido! Clean, friendly and always fresh food for Buffet.

text:
OMG. First time for my family and I. Was I so surprised. The best deep pizza I have had in a very long time. Will be going back real soon.
PLEASE GO AND TRY IT FOR YOURSELF

text: One of my favorite  pizza places, lots of memories  asa kid eating  here after baseball games and birthdays

name: D'Anne Kiley
text: Delightful to see Shakey's opening in Escondido! Lunch buffet is served until 2pm, Monday through Friday and you won't believe the selection. The employees enjoy interacting with guests. The arcade is pricey and you have to charge a card ‚Ä¶More

name: David Gilbreath
text: This is the classic shakey's pizza that so dominatated the US pizza restaurant market in the early to mid 80's.  The return to the old style ameican chain.  Great for families with small children, reasonable prices, great for teen night out.

name: Jason Mancino
text: The pizza wasn't amazing, but it was decent. The happy hour is a good deal, and the overall environment was cool. They have arcades for the kids to play, and the restaurant was very clean inside and out. We will probably go back.

name: DJ TheAwkwardDerpPerson
text: My mom payed 20 bucks to pay for my siblings play card for the arcade area, and it turns out the card is actually 10 bucks so she was supposed to get 10 back. She didnt. She talked to the manager and they said they have no way to give that ‚Ä¶More

name: Anthony Rosa
text: Pizza is just okay, service is good, but overall, I probably won't go back.

name: Eduardo Ocampo
text: This location is New in our city. The food is good my kids loved the arcade zone. Very clean and organized location. I will return again with my family.

name: Juan Ortiz
text: This location just opened the staff us great, food was excellent just as expected.  Good dining area size. We will have our next birthday party there.

text:
If you are in real pizza Shakey's Pizza Palor is the place to great salad bar , hot wings and more and an arcade for your children to get their energy out .
Clean ,  great customer service open late and has brunch special .
Highly recommended .
